content.json:
### Change Log
|Version|Description|
|---|---|
|v1.0	|Initial Version|
|V1.1.0	|Split up the data sets, Overview, Application Rule Logs, Network Rule Logs, DNS Proxy Logs. Added in Investigation visibility with Azure Firewall + Azure Graph. Added in visibility to multiple workspaces and filtering to Firewall resources. |

links.linkLabel: Azure Firewall - Application rule log statitics
Azure Firewall - Network rule log statistics

parameters.name: Workspaces
parameters.query:
where type =~ 'microsoft.operationalinsights/workspaces'
| project id, name
| order by name desc

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS" 
| summarize Volume=count() by bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by time
content.noDataMessage: There are no firewall events being feed within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm logging has been enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into the selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS" 
| summarize Volume=count() by Resource, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Events, by firewall over time
content.noDataMessage: There are no firewall events being feed within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm logging has been enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into the selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
let AFTI = AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| summarize Volume=count() by OperationName
| project Category=OperationName, Volume;
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| summarize Volume=count() by Category
| union AFTI
content.title: Events, by category
content.noDataMessage: There are no firewall events being feed within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm logging has been enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into the selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
let AFTI = AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| summarize Volume=count() by OperationName, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| project Category=OperationName, Volume, TimeGenerated;
AzureDiagnostics 
| where ResourceType == "AZUREFIREWALLS"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| summarize Volume=count() by Category, bin(TimeGenerated, {TimeRange:grain})
| union AFTI
content.title: Events categories, by time
content.noDataMessage: There are no firewall events being feed within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm logging has been enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into the selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.json:
### Firewall Metrics
The data below dosen't read from the Log Analytics workpsace, it's reading directly from the resources which requires resource visibility. 
Click [here for more information on Azure Metrics](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/azure-monitor/platform/data-platform-metrics)

---
# Azure Firewall - Application rule log statitics

content.query:
let ActivityData = AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt)
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action")
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny";
ActivityData
| summarize Amount=count() by SourceIP
| join kind = inner
(
    ActivityData
    | make-series Trend = count() default = 0 on bin(TimeGenerated, 1d) from {TimeRange:start} to {TimeRange:end} step {TimeRange:grain} by SourceIP) on SourceIP
    | project-away SourceIP1, TimeGenerated
    | top 10 by Amount
    | sort by Amount
content.title: Unique Source IP addresses, filterable by SelectedSourceIP
content.noDataMessage: There are no Application Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Application Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| where '{SelectedSourceIP}' == SourceIP or '{SelectedSourceIP}' == "*" 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == ""," default action", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == ""," No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", " default action", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", " default action", TargetPort)
| summarize Count = count(), last_log = datetime_diff("second",now(), max(TimeGenerated)) by RuleCollection, Rule
content.title: Application Rule Usage
content.noDataMessage: There are no Application Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Application Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics | where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| where Resource in (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails | parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 | parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * | parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a | parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b | extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) | extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) | extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") | extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)| where Action == "Deny"
| where '{SelectedSourceIP}' == SourceIP or '{SelectedSourceIP}' == "*"  
| summarize count() by FQDN, bin(TimeGenerated,{TimeRange:grain})
content.title: Denied FDQN's over time
content.noDataMessage: There are no Application Rule logs within the selected workspaces. | parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." *

| where Action == "Deny"
| where '{SelectedSourceIP}' == SourceIP or '{SelectedSourceIP}' == "*"

AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule" 
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails | parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 | parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * | parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a | parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b | extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) | extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) | extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") | extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort) | where Action == "Allow"

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S),SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == ""," default action", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", " default action", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", " default action", TargetPort)
| where '{SelectedSourceIP}' == SourceIP or '{SelectedSourceIP}' == "*"  
| summarize by TimeGenerated, FQDN, Protocol, Action, SourceIP, SourcePort, TargetPort, SourceHost , DestinationPort , ResourceId , ResourceGroup , RuleCollection, Rule, SubscriptionId
content.title: All IP addresses events
content.noDataMessage: There are no Application Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Application Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.json:
---
# Azure Firewall - Network rule log statistics

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize count() by Action
content.title: Rule actions, filterable by RuleAction
content.noDataMessage: There are no Network Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Network Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action: " Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort), NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| summarize Count=count() by TargetPort
content.title: Target ports, filterable by TargetPort
content.noDataMessage: There are no Network Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Network Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| where Action == "DNAT'ed"
| summarize Amount=count() by NatDestination
content.title: DNAT actions, filterable by NatDestination
content.noDataMessage: There are no Network Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Network Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
//| extend Action = iif(Action contains "DNAT'ed", Action="Nah", Action)
| where '{TargetPort}' == TargetPort or '{TargetPort}' == "*"
| where "{RuleAction}" == Action or "{RuleAction}" == "*"
| where '{NatDestination}' == NatDestination or '{NatDestination}' == "*" 
| summarize amount = count() by Action , SourceIP
| sort by amount desc
content.title: Rule actions, by IP addresses
content.noDataMessage: There are no Network Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Network Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination 
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action: " Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", 
Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort), 
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", 
"N/A", NatDestination)
| where '{TargetPort}' == TargetPort or '{TargetPort}' == "*"
| where "{RuleAction}" == Action or "{RuleAction}" == "*"
| where '{NatDestination}' == NatDestination or '{NatDestination}' == "*"   
| summarize AMOUNT=count() by TargetPort, SourceIP
| sort by AMOUNT desc
content.title: Target ports, by Source IP
content.noDataMessage: There are no Network Rule logs within the selected workspaces. If you believe the selection is correct, confirm Network Rule logs are enabled for the Azure Firewall and feeding into this selected workspace. Reference Docs: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/firewall/

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to " TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int * 
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a 
| parse msg_s with * "was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from " SourceIP2 " to " TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", 
case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),
Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),
SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),
TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),
SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),
TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),
NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)  
| where Action == "DNAT'ed"
| where '{TargetPort}' == TargetPort or '{TargetPort}' == "*"
| where "{RuleAction}" == Action or "{RuleAction}" == "*"
| where '{NatDestination}' == NatDestination or '{NatDestination}' == "*"
| summarize Amount=count() by NatDestination, TimeGenerated

| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
| where '{TargetPort}' == TargetPort or '{TargetPort}' == "*"
| where "{RuleAction}" == Action or "{RuleAction}" == "*"

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName <> "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from" SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to" TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int *
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a
| parse msg_s with * " was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from" SourceIP2 " to" TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S),SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
| where '{TargetPort}' == TargetPort or '{TargetPort}' == "*"
| where "{RuleAction}" == Action or "{RuleAction}" == "*"
| where '{NatDestination}' == NatDestination or '{NatDestination}' == "*"
| summarize by TimeGenerated,Protocol, Action, SourcePort, TargetPort, SourceHost , DestinationHost , DestinationPort , NatDestination, ResourceId , ResourceGroup , SubscriptionId

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallDnsProxy"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with "DNS Request: " ClientIP ":" ClientPort " - " QueryID " " Request_Type " " Request_Class " " Request_Name ". " Request_Protocol " " Request_Size " " EDNSO_DO " " EDNS0_Buffersize " " Responce_Code " " Responce_Flags " " Responce_Size " " Response_Duration

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics 
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails 
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny" or Action == "Allow"
| summarize count() by FQDN, Action
| sort by count_ desc
content.title: FQDN Traffic by Count, filterable by FQDN

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where msg_s contains "{FullName:label}" or '{FullName}' == "*"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b 
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt) 
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| where Action == "Deny" or Action == "Allow"
| where SourceIP <> ""
| summarize count() by SourceIP, SubscriptionId
| sort by count_
content.title: SourceIP Address, filterable

content.query:
Resources
| where type =~ 'microsoft.network/networkinterfaces'
| where properties contains "{InvestigateIP}"
| where properties contains '{SelectedSubscriptionId}'
| extend NSG = properties['networkSecurityGroup']['id']
| parse NSG with "/subscriptions/" NetworkSecurityGroup_Sub "/resourceGroups/" NetworkSecurityGroup_rg "/providers/Microsoft.Network/networkSecurityGroups/" NetworkSecurityGroup_Name
| project id, PrivateIPAddress = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['privateIPAddress']),  PublicIPAddress = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['publicIPAddress']['id']), VirtualMachine = tostring(properties['virtualMachine']['id']), subnet = tostring(properties['ipConfigurations'][0]['properties']['subnet']['id']), NetworkSecurityGroup = NetworkSecurityGroup_Name, properties, subscriptionId, tenantId
content.title: SourceIPAddress Resource Lookup

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallApplicationRule"
| where msg_s contains "{FullName:label}" or '{FullName}' == "*"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from " SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " " TempDetails
| where msg_s contains "{InvestigateIPWC:label}" or '{InvestigateIPWC}' == "*"
| parse TempDetails with "was " Action1 ". Reason: " Rule1 
| parse TempDetails with "to " FQDN ":" TargetPortInt:int ". Action: " Action2 "." * 
| parse TempDetails with * ". Rule Collection: " RuleCollection2a ". Rule:" Rule2a 
| parse TempDetails with * "Deny." RuleCollection2b ". Proceeding with" Rule2b
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S),SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt) 
| extend TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action1 = case(Action1 == "denied","Deny","Unknown Action") 
| extend Action = case(Action2 == "",Action1,Action2),Rule = case(Rule2a == "", case(Rule1 == "",case(Rule2b == "","N/A", Rule2b),Rule1),Rule2a),  RuleCollection = case(RuleCollection2b == "",case(RuleCollection2a == "","No rule matched",RuleCollection2a), RuleCollection2b),FQDN = case(FQDN == "", "N/A", FQDN),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort)
| summarize by TimeGenerated, FQDN, Protocol, Action, SourceIP, SourcePort, TargetPort, SourceHost , DestinationPort , ResourceId , ResourceGroup , RuleCollection, Rule, SubscriptionId
content.title: FQDN Lookup logs

content.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "AzureFirewallNetworkRule"
| where OperationName == "AzureFirewallThreatIntelLog"
| where Resource in~ (split("{Resource:label}", ", "))
| parse msg_s with Protocol " request from" SourceIP ":" SourcePortInt:int " to" TargetIP ":" TargetPortInt:int *
| where msg_s contains "{InvestigateIPWC:label}" or '{InvestigateIPWC}' == "*"
| parse msg_s with * ". Action: " Action1a
| parse msg_s with * " was " Action1b " to " NatDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol2 " request from" SourceIP2 " to" TargetIP2 ". Action:" Action2
| parse msg_s with Protocol_s 'request from ' SourceHost_s ':' SourcePort_s 'to ' DestinationHost_s ':' DestinationPort_s 'was' Action_s 'to' DNATDestination
| parse msg_s with Protocol_S 'request from ' SourceHost_S ':' SourcePort_S 'to ' DestinationHost_S ':' DestinationPort_S '. Action:' Action_S
| extend Protocol = strcat(Protocol_s, Protocol_S), SourceHost = strcat(SourceHost_s, SourceHost_S),SourcePort = strcat(SourcePort_s, SourcePort_S), DestinationHost = strcat(DestinationHost_s, DestinationHost_S), DestinationPort = strcat(DestinationPort_s, DestinationPort_S), Action = strcat(Action_s, Action_S)
| extend SourcePort = tostring(SourcePortInt),TargetPort = tostring(TargetPortInt)
| extend Action = case(Action1a == "", case(Action1b == "",Action2,Action1b), Action1a),Protocol = case(Protocol == "", Protocol2, Protocol),SourceIP = case(SourceIP == "", SourceIP2, SourceIP),TargetIP = case(TargetIP == "", TargetIP2, TargetIP),SourcePort = case(SourcePort == "", "N/A", SourcePort),TargetPort = case(TargetPort == "", "N/A", TargetPort),NatDestination = case(NatDestination == "", "N/A", NatDestination)
| summarize by TimeGenerated,Protocol, Action, SourcePort, TargetPort, SourceHost , DestinationHost , DestinationPort , NatDestination, ResourceId , ResourceGroup , SubscriptionId
